alert.note: Alert for Charlotte; Halifax (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 13 at 5:11PM EDT by NWS Blacksburg
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Charlotte and northeastern Halifax Counties through 545 PM EDT... At 511 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Abilene to Mt Laurel. Movement was southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Keysville... Charlotte Court House... Phenix... Redoak... Clover... Nathalie... and Drakes Branch. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Locally heavy rain will quickly reduce visibility and result in ponding of water on roadways, standing water in low lying areas, and minor flooding of creeks, streams, and areas of poor drainage. Drivers are urged to slow down and use extra caution to avoid hydroplaning.
